chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: To run the tutorials you need to download and install JBoss Application and Maven.

section.title: JBoss Application Server 6.x
section.para:
You must set the JBOSS_HOME environment variable to run any of the tutorial examples.
Unix: $ export JBOSS_HOME=<where your JBoss AS 6.x distribution is> Windows: $ set JBOSS_HOME=<where your JBoss AS 6.x distribution is>
To run these examples you need JBoss AS 6 or higher version (if available). JBoss AS can be downloaded from here.

section.title: Maven
section.para: The tutorials can be built with Maven (version 3 or higher). You will have to download it from their site.

section.title: Set the EJB3_TUTORIAL_HOME
section.para: For easy reference throughout the tutorials, we use the EJB3_TUTORIAL_HOME which points to the top level folder where you downloaded the tutorials. Set it appropriately: Unix: $ export EJB3_TUTORIAL_HOME=<where your EJB3 tutorial is> Windows: $ set EJB3_TUTORIAL_HOME=<where your EJB3 tutorial is>
